sect2.title: Command explanations
sect2.para: ./configure --prefix=/usr --mandir=/usr/share/man: installs the binaries and libs to the /usr directory and places the man files in /usr/share/man.
make install-dev: Installs the header files to /usr/include.
If you do not need to use the IPX protocol, or you use a different IPX package, you can optionally pass --disable-ipx and/or --disable-ipx-tools to the configure script to disable these options.
